links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
prog: (Haskell)import Data.List (unfoldr)a030530 n = a030530_list !! (n-1)a030530_list = 0 : concatMap (\n -> unfoldr   (\x -> if x == 0 then Nothing else Just (n, div x 2)) n) [1..]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 05 2011
